rules.name: true_result
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 12) AND 2 AND 3) OR ((1 OR 12) AND 4 AND (5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9) OR ((1 OR 12) AND 4 AND 10 AND 11 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: true

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Is this a rapid CI mode
dynamicChoiceSets.name: IsthisarapidCImode

formulas.name: Age
formulas.expression: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Account.Date_of_Birth__c}) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( {!Account.Date_of_Birth__c}) , DAY( {!Account.Date_of_Birth__c}) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( {!Account.Date_of_Birth__c}), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( {!Account.Date_of_Birth__c}) -1 ), null)

recordCreates.description: Store everything captured in the clinical assessment
recordCreates.name: ClinicalAssessment
recordCreates.label: Clinical Assessment

fields.name: QuestionaireCallScript
fields.fieldText: Now, Id like to ask you questions about your symptoms and medical history.

fields.name: CurrentSymptomsHeading
fields.fieldText: Current Symptoms {!ClinicalAssessmentFor}

fields.name: CoughQ
fields.fieldText: Cough (New Onset or Worsening of Chronic Cough)

value.stringValue: Have you previously diagnosed with COVID-19?
How long ago did you have COVID-19?

fields.name: error
fields.fieldText: Please make sure that the Contact/Case is marked as Active to add Clinical Assessment.

fields.name: MedicalHistoryCallScript
fields.fieldText: Has the individual been diagnosed with any of the following conditions?

fields.name: MedicalHistory
fields.fieldText: Medical History {!ClinicalAssessmentFor}

validationRule.errorMessage: Entered text shall not exceed 80 characters
Entered text shall not exceed 80 characters

fields.name: MedicalHistoryCallScript_0
fields.fieldText: Has the individual been diagnosed with any of the following conditions?

fields.name: MedicalHistory_0
fields.fieldText: Medical History {!ClinicalAssessmentFor}

validationRule.errorMessage: Entered text shall not exceed 80 characters

fields.name: noquarantine
fields.fieldText: This contact does not need to be quarantined based off of vaccination staff or previous diagnosis of COVID-19. Please inform them that they should monitor for COVID-19 symptoms for 14 days after exposure. If they develop symptoms they should get tested and give the COVID hotline a call.

fields.name: Is_this_a_rapid_CI_mode
fields.fieldText: Is this a rapid CI mode

fields.name: Are_you_staying_away_from_others
fields.fieldText: Are you staying away from others?

fields.name: WelcomeText
fields.fieldText: Thanks for taking the time to talk with me today. Id like to ask you a few questions about your health and gather information.

fields.name: May_I_ask_you_a_few_questions_to_understand_how_you_re_feeling
fields.fieldText: May I ask you a few questions to understand how you're feeling?

textTemplates.name: AsymptomaticResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} may be infected or have a risk for infection. Ensure that {!IndividualName} remains in isolation, stays away from public places, and refrains from having visitors.

textTemplates.name: ClinicalAssessmentFor
textTemplates.text: for {!IndividualName}

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_DOB
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid date of birth

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_Email
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid email address.

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_Phone
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid phone number.

textTemplates.name: NoRiskResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} doesn't require testing. Based on {!IndividualName}'s responses, there's no evidence of symptoms of infection. {!IndividualName} can stay healthy by practicing social distancing to reduce community transmission and should follow guidelines from local officials.

textTemplates.name: SymptomaticResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} has symptoms of infection. We'll be in contact regarding self-care steps. Ensure that {!IndividualName} remains in isolation, stays away from public places, and refrains from having visitors.
